Free Energy Barrier in The Semi Grand Canonical Monte Carlo¶

Code author: Olve L. Ødegård

class cemc.mcmc.SGCFreeEnergyBarrier(atoms, T, **kwargs)[source]¶

Class for computing the free energy as a function of composition It applies umbrella sampling to force the system to also visit regions with low statistical weight

Keyword Arguments:
 
  • n_windows Maximum number of windows
  • n_bins Number of bins per window
  • min_singlet Minmum value of singlet term
  • max_singlet Maximum value of singlet term
  • mpicomm* MPI communicator object
